page.title: 16MANYDOWN TENNIS CENTRE
page.content: THE TENNIS COACH AT MANYDOWN TENNIS CENTRE IS 24. HE HAS BEEN WORKING AT MANYDOWN TENNIS CENTRE SINCE NOVEMBER 1984. THE COURT WAS BUILT IN DECEMBER 1984.CHILDREN AND ADULTS COME TO THE CENTRE FOR COACHING AND TO PLAY.THE CENTRE IS USED BY 100 TO 120 PEOPLE NON MEMBERS HAVE TO PAY Â£15 AN HOUR MEMBERS PAY Â£11 AN HOUR. THEY HAVE HAD FAMOUS PEOPLE THERE FOR EXAMPLE JOHN MCENROE,ANNABELLE CROFT,AND PETER FLEMING HAVE PLAYED AT THE TENNIS CENTRE. SCHOOLS SUCH AS HAWKTREE,CRANLEIGH,WINCHESTER, AND LORD WANDSWORTH USE THE MANYDOWN CENTRE. THE CENTRE IS OPEN FROM 6am UNTIL 12pm EVERY DAY OF THE YEAR BECAUSE THE COURTS CAN BE COVERED BY A TRANSPARENT DOME.
